fullText: This gorgeous dance musical based on Sufjan Stevens' indie-folk song cycle captures the yearning spirit of the original album while expanding it into a deeply moving theatrical experience.
dtliExcerpt: This gorgeous dance musical based on Sufjan Stevens' indie-folk song cycle captures the yearning spirit of the original album while expanding it into a deeply moving theatrical experience.
